This escrow allows user to deposit INV collateral directly into the xINV contract, earning APY and allowing them to delegate votes on behalf of the xINV collateral","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/escrows/INVEscrow.sol":"INVEscrow"},"evmVersion":"london","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":ds-test/=lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/escrows/INVEscrow.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7448533a28efbafb4e7afdb54e7565200d0e77239a10d5cd12aefb59625c6465","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://2fc06fce1e35c2d8d372673c99ee6e5087da0a9c7fd3c12fdd891b4084746350","dweb:/ipfs/QmdxHjkmSGAN1JYNmUWSWr88C2PmMhLmjDBXvifyuSgMN1"]}},"version":1}

returns._0: Uint representing the INV token balance of the escrow including the additional INV accrued from xINV

params.delegatee: The address to be delegated voting power

initialize(address,address).details: Must be called right after proxy is created.

params._beneficiary: The beneficiary who may delegate token voting power
params._token: The IERC20 token representing the INV governance token

onDeposit().details: This function should remain callable by anyone to handle direct inbound transfers.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 token to be transferred.
params.recipient: The address to receive payment from the escrow

balance().notice: Get the token balance of the escrow

delegate(address).notice: Delegates voting power of the underlying xINV.

onDeposit().notice: Function called by market on deposit. Will deposit INV into xINV

pay(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the associated ERC20 token to a recipient.

documentation.text:
@notice Get the token balance of the escrow
@return Uint representing the INV token balance of the escrow including the additional INV accrued from xINV

@notice Function called by market on deposit. Will deposit INV into xINV 
@dev This function should remain callable by anyone to handle direct inbound transfers.

@notice Delegates voting power of the underlying xINV.
@param delegatee The address to be delegated voting power
